name: Ken's Galaxy
description:
Before Super Space Galaxy, there was simply Ken's Galaxy.

This is a demo I made to test out the idea of flying around a galaxy and zooming in to individual planets. It was designed to be used on a mobile phone, so you use a virtual joystick to move around.

Ken's Galaxy is simply a prototype that served its purpose, and some of the lessons learned were used to make Super Space Galaxy, a massive open-world shooter!

Super Space Galaxy on itch.io: https://plasmabeamgames.itch.io/super-space-galaxy

Blog post about Ken's Galaxy: https://plasmabeamgames.wordpress.com/2020/11/22/kens-galaxy/

Instructions:

- Move around by holding the left mouse button on the screen as a virtual joystick.
- Go to uninhabited planets to collect ore
- Go to inhabited systems to sell the ore and buy upgrades
- Don't buy the weapons upgrade, it doesn't do anything!
